The claim is accompanied by a viral vide: missile batteries intercepting rockets fired at a US base in Iraq.
Alt News received multiple requests to f: check the video on its official mobile application, highlighting the public's interest in verifying the claim.
Alt News used InVID to analyze the video: breaking it into key-frames and performing a reverse-search on Google. This analysis led to the discovery that the video is actually from a military-themed video game called ARMA3, confirming the inauthenticity of the claim.
